original_title: Perfume Genius - Live At The Palace Theatre
overview: Full concert film of Perfume Genius' performance of songs from 'Set My Heart On Fire Immediately' and others, benefitting Immigration Equality, an LGBTQ immigrant rights group, live at the Palace Theatre in Los Angeles during the COVID-19 pandemic.
tagline: Can you describe them for me?
title: Perfume Genius - Live At The Palace Theatre
